resources.string: It looks like you\'ve given busboy permission to see your location, but the location setting is turned off. To see nearby stops, please enable the location setting.

You can search for nearby stops if you've granted busboy permission to view your location and have the location setting enabled. If you're already at your stop, you can find upcoming busses by entering your stop ID (found at the bottom of the sign) and pressing the search button.

Long-pressing a 'nearby' stop will display a map of walking directions from your location to the stop, and short-pressing will display a list of upcoming busses for that stop. Short pressing a bus prediction will display the current location of that bus on a map.

Busboy is currently in a beta testing state, so there are potential bugs. For bug reports and feature requests, please file an issue on github.com/taitsmith/busboy or send an email to busboy@taitsmith.com
